metadata.name: This City I Love
metadata.description:
This token was airdropped to the first five token holders of Nick Coleman's first NFT release. 
https://nft.nickcoleman.live

Each of the five holders of the 'This City I Love' NFT will receive 20% of all streaming royalty revenue generated from music streaming services such as Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube etc. Payments will be made in USDC to the token holders Ethereum address. 

The song was originally released in 2010 on DJ Hell's record label International DeeJay Gigolo Records. This re-release explores the use cases and possibilities of music ownership between artists and fans/investors through smart contracts and blockchain technology.

Thank you for your support, Nick
